RelatedSentence: MILWAUKEE ( Reuters ) - Seven people were injured on Monday in an explosion at a foundry in Wisconsin , rescue personnel and local media said .

RelatedSentence: The dispatcher said seven people were injured , but did not know the extent of the injuries or the cause of the explosion .
